resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103280</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103280</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201840</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chart the Effects of Smoking </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwerfen Sie die Effekte des Rauchens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dressez une carte les effets du tabagisme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça um mapa dos efeitos de fumar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetti gli effetti di fumare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιάστε τα αποτελέσματα του καπνίσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planee los efectos de fumar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will estimate the amount of time they have each been exposed to second-hand smoke throughout their lives and chart the results as a class, discussing possible consequences of different levels of exposure.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer schätzen die Zeitmenge, das sie 
jedes Gebrauchtrauche während ihrer Lebensdauern ausgesetzt worden 
sind und entwerfen die Resultate als Kategorie und behandeln mögliche
Konsequenzen der unterschiedlichen Stufen der Berührung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants estimeront la quantité de temps 
où ils chacun ont été exposés à la fumée d'occasion durant toute
leurs vies et dresseront une carte les résultats comme classe, 
discutant des conséquences possibles de différents niveaux 
d'exposition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes estimarão a quantidade de tempo 
onde cada um foram expostos ao fumo second-hand durante todo suas 
vidas e farão um mapa dos resultados como uma classe, discutindo 
conseqüências possíveis de níveis diferentes da exposição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi valuteranno il tempo che ciascuno sono
stati esposti a fumo usato durante le loro vite e progetteranno i 
risultati come codice categoria, discutente le conseguenze possibili 
dei livelli differenti di esposizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα υπολογίσουν το χρονικό διάστημα που 
κάθε ένας έχουν εκτεθεί στο μεταχειρισμένο καπνό καθ' όλη τη 
διάρκεια των ζωών τους και σχεδιάζουν τα αποτελέσματα ως κλάση, 
συζητώντας τις πιθανές συνέπειες των διαφορετικών επιπέδων 
έκθεσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes estimarán la cantidad de tiempo 
que los cada uno han expuesto al humo de segunda mano a través de sus
vidas y planearán los resultados como clase, discutiendo 
consecuencias posibles de diversos niveles de la exposición.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201840</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103280</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/chart-the-effects-of-smoking</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
